name: Crown Social
tagline: We #slay on the Internet...and in real life!
description: Crown Social is an award-winning, full-service creative agency focused on building and executing on integrated social media marketing strategies. Our value proposition leverages deep technical and digital expertise, a keen understanding of cultural trends both online and offline, and a powerful creativity to cut through all the noise and resonate with some of the most hyper-saturated, attention-deficient audiences in history.
